meanings.definition: The act of proving or showing something to be true or genuine.
meanings.sent1: The authentications on the document confirmed its validity.
meanings.sent2: She provided her fingerprint for authentications at the security checkpoint.
meanings.sent3: The detective used the authentications to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent4: His smile was an authentication of his happiness.
meanings.sent5: The authentications on the painting made it clear it was an original.

meanings.definition: The process of verifying the identity of a user or system.
meanings.sent1: The website required authentications before granting access to the account.
meanings.sent2: The authentications were successful, and he gained entry to the network.
meanings.sent3: The robot's authentications were so strict, even the owner had trouble accessing it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the authentication that she was indeed his best friend.
meanings.sent5: The authentications on the keycard ensured only authorized personnel could enter.

meanings.definition: The action of confirming the accuracy or validity of something.
meanings.sent1: The scientist conducted multiple authentications to verify the experiment results.
meanings.sent2: The authentications of the data revealed no errors in the calculations.
meanings.sent3: The cat's meow was an authentication that it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: Her nod was an authentication of her agreement with the proposal.
meanings.sent5: The authentications of the ingredients ensured the recipe would turn out perfectly.
